title: Search for Properties for a Buyer
description: A buyer client has provided their search criteria. The agent needs to set up an automated MLS search for them.

tasks.description: Identify the buyer's search criteria: location, price range, number of beds/baths, and specific features (e.g., a pool).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly logs all of the buyer's search parameters.

tasks.description: Create a new saved search in the MLS system based on the client's criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately configures the search parameters in the MLS.

tasks.description: Set up the search to automatically email new listings that match the criteria to the buyer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enables automated email alerts for the client.
